name: Space Race (Wizuud)
description:
This is my first little project in a series of prototypes with the aim of becoming a better Developer. Welcome to Space Race!

Controls:

Space + Shift (Acceleration, Deceleration)

E + Q (Roll Control)

W + S (Pitch Control)
